document_data.mainbody:
Brother Shad was a priest of Chauntea inhabiting Immilmar in Rashemen in the .
Brother Shad was in charge of the other priests within the Temple of Chauntea in Immilmar. Much of his time was spent monitoring Bhallas worship in Rashemen with the hopes to avoid cults springing up which could be easily infiltrated. Though he was a foreigner to Rasheman, Brother Shad and his brethren were well respected because of their charity work.
